Jamendo | JavaScript/TypeScript Developer | Luxembourg City | Onsite | Full-Time

Jamendo is the worldâ€™s largest royalty-free music community for independent artists. We reach millions of music enthusiasts globally every month through our website & apps.

You will create new features on Jamendo websites/apps & optimize existing infrastructure, making it more scalable & efficient. We offer an environment where you can grow your skills in state-of-the-art technologies & frameworks. We value a friendly & creative working environment.

Details here: https://www.jamendo.com/jobs/javaScriptTypeScriptDeveloper

PS: We're also hiring a Data Scientist (https://www.jamendo.com/jobs/dataScientist)
